sentences.en: -- Drawing up overall city plans and readjusting the layout of urban functions.
sentences.cn: -- 编制城市总体规划,调整城市功能布局.

sentences.en: A circuit diagram that indicates the physical layout of the connections.
sentences.cn: 标明实际连接布局的电路图.

sentences.en: A diagram of the new road layout was superimposed on a map of the city.
sentences.cn: 新公路的规划示意图被叠映在该城市的地图上。

sentences.en: A layout of the kind used by programmers is called a flowchart.
sentences.cn: 程序设计员所用的一种总的布局叫做流程图.

sentences.en: All the flats in the building had the same layout.
sentences.cn: 大楼里所有的公寓布局都是一样的。

sentences.en: At a three - way junction the usual layout adopted is the trumpet.
sentences.cn: 三路交叉口的布置通常采用喇叭形.

sentences.en: He tried to recall the layout of the farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 他努力回想农舍的布局。

sentences.en: She knows the layout of the back streets like the back of her hand.
sentences.cn: 她对那些偏僻的街道了如指掌.

sentences.en: The designer chooses the layout of reinforcement.
The designer must consider this factor in the layout.
sentences.cn: 设计者在设计方案中必须考虑这一因素.

sentences.en: The layout should be clear and easy on the eye.
Their house has a good layout.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子设计得很好.

sentences.en: This boat has a good deck layout making everything easy to operate.
sentences.cn: 这艘船的甲板布局合理，使得所有操控都很方便。

sentences.en: This map shows the layout of the plant.
sentences.cn: 这张图展示了工厂的布局.

sentences.en: Though Paris has a better layout than London or Rome, it nevertheless cannot compare with Peiping.
sentences.cn: 论说巴黎的布置已比伦敦罗马匀调得多了, 可是比上北平还差点事儿.

phrases.tran_cn: 布局调整；页面自动调整命令
布图设计；布局设计；布线设计
实体布局；实际布置图；物理布局
管路布置；管道平面布置图
工厂布置，车间布置；设备布置
数的标准分布；标准布局；标准配置

trans.tran_cn: 布局，安排，设计，布置图，规划图
trans.tran_en: the way in which something such as a town, garden, or building is arranged
